Package index

Basics

logger()
Create a logger
log_at() log_debug() log_info() log_warn() log_error() log_fatal()
Write logs at a given level

Appenders

console_appender() file_appender()
Send logs to their final destination with Appenders
syslog_appender()
Send logs to the local syslog
http_appender()
Send logs over HTTP
tcp_appender()
Send logs over TCP

Layouts

default_log_layout() simple_log_layout() bare_log_layout() logfmt_log_layout() json_log_layout()
Format logs with Layouts

Advanced

level() `level<-`() available.loglevels()
Set the logging threshold level for a logger dynamically
